HasTestResults=Results |format= table }} =Traceability Links= == User Needs versus Features == {{#ask: [[Category:Features]] |?BelongsTo=Need |? = Feature | mainlabel=- | format= table }} ==Features versus Use Cases == {{#ask: [[Category:UseCase]] |? = UseCases |?BelongsTo=Features | mainlabel=- | format= table }} ==Features versus Supplementary Requirements== {{#ask: [[Category:FunctionalityReq]] |?BelongsTo=Features |? = Functional Requirements | mainlabel=- | format= table }}
{{#ask: [[Category:NonFunctionalReq]] |?BelongsTo=Features |? = Non Functional Requirements | mainlabel=- | format= table }}
{{#ask: [[Category:Requirements]] |?BelongsTo=Features |? = Supplementary Requirements | mainlabel=- | format= table }} ==Use Cases to Test Cases== {{#ask: [[Category:TestCases]] |?BelongsTo=UseCase |? = TestCases | mainlabel=- | format= table }} =Glossary= [[Form:FormGlossary| Create a new term]]
